1.0.name: wordpress/auto-list-of-references
1.0.description:
Generates a list of links used in a post. This can be used to create a list of references like those in scientific publications. Add [lor] at the end of your post (or wherever you want the list of references) and add a title attribute to all links which should appear in the list.

E.g. <a href="http://somelink.org" title="Homepage of somelink">Some link</a>
